void decode_bro_fists (const bro_fist_t *orders, bro_fist_t *response, engines_t *motors)
 Decoding function for a set of BROFists.

Function Documentation

void decode_bro_fists ( const bro_fist_t *  orders,
bro_fist_t *  response,
engines_t *  motors 
)

Decoding function for a set of BROFists.

This is the heart of the whole SPAM Client. It takes an array of BROFists, decodes them, then behave accordingly. After all the operations have been done the responses are used to create a number of BROFist to send back equal to that received containing all the data requested.

Parameters:
orders BROFist Array to be decoded.
response BROFist Array with the results of the operations.
motors The structure containing all the Servo Motors' Data.
